derivation: from G1909 (ἐπιβαίνω) and the base of G939 (ἐπιβαίνω);
kjv_def: come (into), enter into, go abroad, sit upon, take ship
strongs_def: to walk upon, i.e. mount, ascend, embark, arrive
outline:
1. to get upon, mount
    1. to embark in
    2. to go aboard (a ship)
  2. to set foot in, enter
